Name: Enterprise
Reclassified: In reserve between 5 January 1945, but was used for trooping duties postwar.
Fate:
Scrapped
Handed over to BISCO for scrapping 11 April 1946
Arrived at Cashmore's yard at Newport, Wales on 21 April 1946 for breaking up
Badge: On a field red, a lion rampant under a star silver.
Range: 8,000 nmi (15,000 km; 9,200 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
7 × BL 6-inch Mk XII guns
3 × QF 4-inch AA guns
16 × 21-inch torpedo tubes (4x4)
Armour:
Belt: 3 in (76 mm) (amidships); 1.5–2.5 in (38–64 mm) (bow); 2 in (51 mm) (stern)
Deck: 1 in (25 mm) (upper, amidships); 1 in (25 mm) (over rudder)
